comments_since_last_sample.body:
Shirt jackets has been in and out like 5 times in the past 25 years. Shirt jackets should be staples in men's fashion. 

Mock neck is always in my rotation. They look good with a denim jacket especially.

You are spot on with a lot of these trends. Guys, he's talking about how to stay on trend. Chelsea boots and tight jeans were on trend but not anymore. They still look good though but aren't going to look as fashion conscious as that puffer and some relaxed denim with laced boots. I actually was thinking my bomber jacket from All Saints is not as wavy as it once was. I have been rocking my leather biker which one could argue peaked a year or two ago. But I'm also experimenting and just cooped my first pair of Rick Owens pants and shoes. Keep up the good content.

This is H&M sponsored video i think... Lol 
Aight bro, nice video.. I disagree with some  of the stuff you said but turtle neck and skinny joggers? Hell No!
None of these items are out of style, they have literally been around for decades and are wardrobe staples. He is just tired of wearing them, so he should just switch up his style.
